title: Because They're Black
creator_credit: Rosemary Burden, Roy Wooding, Education Dept, S A and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: A series of revealing interviews with Aboriginal students show what pressures exist for them in a white racist society. Teachers, parents and teacher’s aides are also interviewed. A good discussion starter for all those involved in the education of Aboriginal students.
